title: Problem with the new Warwick (not balance related)
body:
Can we drop the audio "bong bong" noise that happens when you are in range of his passive?

The visual indicator is plenty and the audio is just annoying. (Acutally just being aware that he can hunt you when you get low is enough.) It gets in the way of audio cues that actually matter and it isn't like Rengar ult where it only pops when you are being hunted.

His old one popped when he was nearby so it was helpful but this one just goes off whenever you are low and is very distracting.

You could even change it back to just a howl if you want. Just... not the whole audio clip from the preview video.
